data.description: Covers innovation and entrepreneurship in an existing corporate environment. Adopt the perspective of decision-makers who must evaluate the potential of new technologies, decide on their adoption, and establish their implementation in the current firm's activities and products. Discuss how established firms can build an internal environment such that all employees adopt entrepreneurial behaviors and generate their own technological or business model innovations.
data.title: STRATEGIC MANAGEMENT OF INNOVATION AND CORPORATE ENTREPRENEURSHIP

data.description: Gain and apply knowledge about foundations of entrepreneurship, and key topics such as founding teams, customer/market discovery, starting and growing a business.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO ENTREPRENEURSHIP
